mapper.sql: SKTNO, JLBH, INX, JYLX, CARDNO, PCH, CKH, LSH, JE, ZKJE, SKFSID
mapper.select:
select from ( select
from SALE_BANKDETAIL where SKTNO = #{sktno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and JLBH = #{jlbh,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by inx desc) where ROWNUM =1
mapper.insert: insert into SALE_BANKDETAIL (SKTNO, JLBH, INX, JYLX, CARDNO, PCH, CKH, LSH, JE, ZKJE, SKFSID) values (#{sktno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jlbh,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{jylx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ckh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{je,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zkje,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{skfsid,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into SALE_BANKDETAIL
SKTNO,
JLBH,
INX,
JYLX,
CARDNO,
PCH,
CKH,
LSH,
JE,
ZKJE,
SKFSID,

mapper.update:
update SALE_BANKDETAIL
JYLX = #{jylx,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARDNO = #{cardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PCH = #{pch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CKH = #{ckh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LSH = #{lsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JE = #{je,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ZKJE = #{zkje,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SKFSID = #{skfsid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where SKTNO = #{sktno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and JLBH = #{jlbh,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and INX = #{inx,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
